dict.acceptation: 提供，供给( provide的过去式和过去分词)；

sent.orig: The explanation is provided in black, and examples are provided in red in italics.
sent.trans: 解释用黑色字，范例用红色斜体字。

sent.orig: Either a required impersonation level was not provided, or the provided impersonation level is invalid.
sent.trans: 指定的模拟级别无效，或所提供的模拟级别无效。

sent.orig: Only air ventilation system is provided in badminton court booking session, no air conditioning is provided.
sent.trans: 场馆于羽毛球场租场时段只开放通风系统，不设冷气开放。

sent.orig: The text, and images will be provided. Cover design will be provided.
sent.trans: 文本，图像将被提供。封面设计将提供。

sent.orig: The government provided provided loans to aid the sale of Bear Stearns.
sent.trans: 政府提供贷款来拯救被卖的梅林。
